name: crabmeat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the meat inside a crab that can be eaten: Serve the melon salad with the fresh crabmeat. Here's how to clean and extract all the crab meat from a whole crab in a step-by-step demonstration.
More examplesFewer examplesPick through the white crab meat and remove any shell.She chose vegetable roulade with crabmeat and feta-stuffed tomato.Add a tablespoon of oil and the crabmeat and toss with the garlic and chillies.For variety, add one tin of crabmeat when you add the shrimp.
